product_name: The Hiker's Hip Pocket Guide to the Mendocino Coast
long_description: This revised and expanded guide features more than 50 miles of new trails along California's Mendocino Coast. Author: Bob Lorentzen. Softcover; 240 pages; black-and-white illustrations. Bored Feet Press; copyright 1999. Great for walkers, backpackers, bikers, handicapped, equestrians, picnickers, tidepoolers and other nature lovers.
short_description: This revised and expanded guide features more than 50 miles of new trails along California's Mendocino Coast.
